channel.title: CVE Feed for 42Gears -- Surelock Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for 42Gears -- Surelock Windows

item.title: CVE-2023-2331|2023-04-28T07:16:21.298Z -- 42gears -- surelock%20%20windows
item.description: Unquoted service Path or Element vulnerability in 42Gears Surelock Windows SureLock Service (NixService.Exe) on Windows application will allows to insert arbitrary code into the service. This issue affects Surelock Windows : from 2.3.12 through 2.40.0.
